casebody.data:
(June 17, 1958)

(Republished)

Kossman and Co., Inc., Appellant, v. Feuchtwanger Corporation et al., Respondents.

Order so far as appealed from unanimously affirmed, with $20 costs and disbursements to the respondents. Appellant is granted leave to serve an amended complaint within 20 days after service of a copy of the order entered hereon, with notice of entry. No opinion. Concur—Rabin, J. P., M. M. Frank, Valente, McNally and Stevens, JJ.
